Class InternshipApplication

java.lang.Object
sc2002_grpproject.entity.InternshipApplication
public class InternshipApplication extends Object
Represents a student's application for an internship. Tracks application status, withdrawal requests, and placement confirmation.

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipApplication

      public InternshipApplication(Student student, Internship internship)
      Constructs a new InternshipApplication. Initial status is PENDING with no withdrawal request or placement confirmation.
      Parameters:
      student - the student applying for the internship
      internship - the internship being applied to

    • isWithdrawalRequested

      public boolean isWithdrawalRequested()
      Checks if a withdrawal has been requested for this application.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal status is "PENDING", false otherwise

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(ApplicationStatus status)

    • setWithdrawalRequested

      public void setWithdrawalRequested(boolean requested)
      Sets whether a withdrawal has been requested.
      Parameters:
      requested - true to set withdrawal status to "PENDING", false to set it to "-"
